languages.text: Благодаря Кибелле и Лорд-капитану печальная легенда о Немезите, выродке и лжезащитнике угнетенных, скоро растворится в тьме небытия.
languages.translation_comment:
варианты названий:
- The Saint. The Reversed Sword. The Monster.
- When the card is reversed

варианты названий:
- The Saint. The Reversed Sword. The Monster.
- When the card is reversed

languages.text: Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.
languages.original_text: Благодаря Кибелле и Лорд-капитану печальная легенда о Немезите, выродке и лжезащитнике угнетенных, скоро растворится в тьме небытия.

traits.locale_text: Thanks to Kibellah and Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, anathema and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.
Thanks to Kibellah and Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, anathema and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.
Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.
Thanks to Kibellah and Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, anathema and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.
Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.
Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.
Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.
Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.

languages.text: Danke Kibellah und dem Lord Captain wird die pathetische Legende von Nemesit, dem falschen Streiter der Unterdrückten bald in Vergessenheit geraten.
languages.original_text: Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.

traits.locale_text: Danke Kibellah und dem Lord Captain wird die pathetische Legende von Nemesit, dem falschen Streiter der Unterdrückten bald in Vergessenheit geraten.

languages.text: Gracias a Kibellah y {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán, la solemne leyenda de Nemesitio, aberración y falso adalid de los oprimidos, pronto caerá en el olvido.
languages.original_text: Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a Kibellah y {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán, la solemne leyenda de Nemesitio, aberración y falso adalid de los oprimidos, pronto caerá en el olvido.

languages.text: キベラとロード・キャプテンの力で、虐げられた人々の偽りの王者、ネメサイトの神がかった伝説はまもなく忘却の彼方へと追いやられるだろう。
languages.original_text: Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.

traits.locale_text: キベラとロード・キャプテンの力で、虐げられた人々の偽りの王者、ネメサイトの神がかった伝説はまもなく忘却の彼方へと追いやられるだろう。

languages.text: 在绮贝菈与领主舰长的努力下，虚假的英雄涅墨斯特，以及他那所谓为了被压迫者而战的传说，很快就会被所有人遗忘。
languages.original_text: Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.

traits.locale_text: 在绮贝菈与领主舰长的努力下，虚假的英雄涅墨斯特，以及他那所谓为了被压迫者而战的传说，很快就会被所有人遗忘。

languages.text: Grâce à Kibellah et {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, la légende de Némésite, aberration et faux champion des opprimés, sera bientôt reléguée aux limbes de l'oubli.
languages.original_text: Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.

traits.locale_text: Grâce à Kibellah et {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, la légende de Némésite, aberration et faux champion des opprimés, sera bientôt reléguée aux limbes de l'oubli.

languages.text: Kibellah ve Lord Kaptan sayesinde ezilenlerin sahte şampiyonu sapkın Nemezit'in vakur efsanesi, yakında ebediyete sevk edilecek.
languages.original_text: Thanks to Kibellah and the Lord Captain, the solemn legend of Nemesite, aberration and false champion of the oppressed, will soon be consigned to oblivion.
